Description: Fragment of painted limestone relief depicting a king(?) seizing a captive by the leg.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr Harry Reginald Holland Hall
Curator's comments: Bibliography: D. Arnold, in A. Oppenheim, D. Arnold, D. Arnold & K. Yamamoto (eds), Ancient Egypt Transformed. The Middle Kingdom, New York 2015, 164-6
